body.p: Gov. Magoffin Inclosed find my petto. I spoke to the city atty who would have signed my petto. As he told me at any time. but I did not see him this morning. you may take it for granted that all is right. I am a candidate for office as you will see from my inclosed card. I have great oods to run against but I think by industry I will make the . I hope that you will relieve me inby a release of this fine.
